instructions: In a bowl, combine the soups, tomatoes, picante sauce, green pepper, onion and chili powder. In a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish, layer half of the tortilla strips, chicken, soup mixture and cheese. Repeat layers. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 40-50 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
12 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1-inch strips
title: Fiesta Chicken
